extractions.description: This research focuses on optimizing bid prices for real-time bidding (RTB) in online display advertisements. The goal is to design a risk-aware data-driven bid optimization model that maximizes the expected profit for the advertiser while controlling the risk of overspending the budget within a given period.

title.value: Risk-Aware Bid Optimization for Online Display Advertisement
title.justification: The title accurately captures the core focus of the research, which is to optimize bids in an online advertisement setting while being mindful of associated risks.
